title: Liquidity Mining Rewards for Cycle 2
body:
The CALM portal farm has been running since September 29, 2020. At that time 10,000 $COIN and 1,000,000 $CRED were allocated to the farm to be mined with $COIN - ETH UNI V2 LP tokens. Since then, the pool has remained relatively steady with an approximate average of 70% of total pool liquidity staked. 

As we approach the end of the first 30 day cycle, we must address what to do concerning LP staking rewards for the next cycle. Please vote according to whether you would like to see an increase, decrease or no-change to the rewards in the next cycle.

If the "no-change" option wins a majority of the votes, then this issue will be considered closed. If the majority of votes goes to either increase or decrease rewards, then a follow-up vote will be held to determine the size of the change.
choices: No Change (Keep rewards as they were in the first cycle)
author: 0x63Bc9fdC6b27e0C67A1d0478f9C4d36Bc08a8C39
